html:
6.10.20  2:44 pm   Why is soap tasty?

      because it's so clean

6.10.20  2:37 pm   your music gives me reason to live. Thank you

      i am coming up with some even more reasons

6.10.20  2:08 pm   do you like air conditioners?

      sort of

6.10.20  2:06 pm   how can i motivate myself chief

      if you figure out what you would like motivation for, then you get to be the chief

6.10.20  2:04 pm   do you like things

      yes. everything is things. this is thing world

6.10.20  1:45 pm   are 3d glasses necessary for permanent 3d vision

      no

6.10.20  1:33 pm   thoughts on Alfred the Great?

      'pretty good'

6.10.20  1:20 pm   Is memory really necessary? 

      find out, soon

6.10.20  1:10 pm   how flat is the earth?

      almost flat enough to fit on the internet

6.10.20  12:56 pm   In the music industry, is it smarter to start a job at the bottom of the scene you love, or pretty high in a scene you hate?

      if you go the other way i think it loops around

6.10.20  12:24 pm   Do you believe in pure genuine music making in 2020?

      yes and every other time also

6.10.20  12:01 pm   how do you type?

      just keep pressing 'type'

6.10.20  11:28 am   do you create for the process or for the product?

      the process is for the product, and the product is for the process

6.10.20  11:12 am   How do I care for my garden?

      plant a second garden, and see if the 2 gardens can care for each other

6.10.20  10:45 am   I feel like I have a trillion ideas and I don't know which one to work on. What do I do?

      ah, you must complete the 12 levels of suffering, then the 13th which is the unlucky last and final level; the reason it is unlucky is because after you finish it you will be informed that there is another level after that

6.10.20  10:43 am   How much "Everything" are you working on?

      all of it, if possible

6.10.20  10:37 am   do your songs have meaning or nah?

      do you

6.10.20  10:15 am   Helo and Goodby do u feel alright?

      yes and no

6.10.20  9:34 am   How do you feel about flowers?

      a hapless slip up, revealing the true intentions of the universe

6.10.20  9:17 am   What is your favorite school subject?

      learning

6.10.20  8:40 am   how does ice cream physics work?

      plop, ooze,

6.10.20  8:37 am   When will you teach us what you've learned?

      always

6.10.20  8:13 am   wy is a question mark shaped like a twisted exclamation mark?

      could be a desperate attempt to see things from a different angle

6.10.20  8:13 am   Help! I have lost my sanity!

      it's like right over there

6.10.20  7:57 am   Where is the truth?

      it's like right over there

6.10.20  6:35 am   do you use adobe animate?

     absolutely not

     if not, what software do you use fro the videos

     at this point, it's almost as if i am making my own software

6.10.20  6:34 am   can i give the coronavirus the coronavirus?

      that just might work

6.10.20  5:45 am   what kind of music makes the best instrument?

      regular

6.10.20  5:19 am   why are you keeping a sectret about what you are working on?

     it's not a secret, i must have described it 1000 times

     people are getting worried.

      yea but not as worried as me

6.10.20  5:06 am   is the reason you have such a big ukelele because it's hard to play an F chord on the guitar? 

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

6.10.20  4:59 am   Hi Bill! How do you create the synth-sound of the melody in most of your jazz songs?

      try this: set the mod wheel (or any controllable wheel or slider) to an LFO and then have the LFO control the pitch. adjust the speed and range to taste. then use it while you play

6.10.20  4:27 am   How do you answer so many questions without sleeping?

     the secret is that it takes me less than 14 hours to answer 24 hours worth of questions

     Are you a robot or something?

     no

     Also love your work

     i am tempted to believe you

6.10.20  3:40 am   can we call music moosic for now on?

      i dare you to continue doing that for longer than 10 days

6.10.20  3:38 am   Do you spend way too much time thinking about what other people are going to think?

      no

6.10.20  3:38 am   what time did you answer this question

      Wednesday, June 10, 2020 11:44:36 PM

6.10.20  3:15 am   What's the best thing to have on bread

      a summit

6.10.20  3:08 am   what is the most complicated word you know

      that

6.10.20  2:58 am   Do you ever look at a map upside down to get a fresh, unbiased look at the world

      yes. unlabeled spherical globe offers even more freedom

6.10.20  2:58 am   who decides what history is cannon?

      banknotes maybe

6.10.20  1:28 am   define everything

      i will keep trying

6.10.20  1:21 am   Do you have any tips for making music or playing guitar or piano? 

      no one can do it quite like you

6.10.20  1:15 am   6.8.20  9:55 pm uh, no? the theme of the simpsons is in lydian. not maj or min

      hm, no i would argue that one is significantly more 'twisty' than just lydian (or any 'mode')

6.10.20  1:10 am   If you made bumper stickers, what would they say?

      not say words, just contribute to the design of the car. help the car say what it's saying

6.10.20  1:05 am   how did you feel about the plot twist in frozen 2?

      let me guess.................... they melted

6.10.20  1:04 am   I'm watching your music videos on a bottle of dollar store sizzurp & I gave very peculiar things to say about your tweening keyframes.

     never done it

       Let me guess, not enough ram to make truly good use of the frameroll?  

     that was then

     Either way, to secret is to keyframe where the sound is *going* to be.  It's one of those speed of light/speed of sound/ latency things only us AV peeps knows about. I'm talking secrets of the dUniverse here

     thanks you fixed me

6.10.20  1:02 am   as a content creator has becoming famous diminished your passion for what you do,

     it typically multiplies by 1000 every month. this has been steadily on course for at least the last 200 months

     or is doing your passion feeling more like a job to do now that you are basically doing it as a job.

      one would think i would have the decency to treat it that way, but no, the 1000x multiplication of all passions, continues to persist, unthinkable as that may be

6.10.20  12:59 am   Worst part about 2020 so far?

      "there's too much confusion, i can't get no relief"

6.10.20  12:59 am   What is the meaning of life?

      could be you

6.10.20  12:58 am   What are your top 5 songwriting tips in as little words as possible?

      no one has ever figured out how to write a song but there is a trillion dollar reward to anyone who can figure out how. plus there is a pretty substantial reward for getting close, which is a good second bet

6.10.20  12:58 am   Do you think you could do 3D animation?

      we'll have to find out
